name: The Lorentz Factor
description:
The Lorentz Factor is a small platformer game. You have the ability to temporarily slow time. Use this ability to make your way through all the levels. If a level is too hard you can skip it by going to the level select in the main menu.

CONTROLS: (Only keyboard and mouse is supported)

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • Left Click to Fire a short range beam that will move objects it hits
  • Right Click to slow down time until Right Click is pressed again or the bar at the left of the screen runs out
  • E to pick up an item in front of the player
